description: A request for finding a route across the EVE Online universe.
title: Route Request

___via.description: The order of the waypoints will be optimized according to the rules.
___via.title: A list of waypoints that must be visited

___solarSystems.description: If provided, any solar system listed here will not be used as transit system.
___solarSystems.title: A list of solar systems to avoid

___avoid.title: Things to avoid when finding a path

___to.description: If given, this destination will always be the last of the route.
___to.title: The fixed destination for the route

$eref.description: This will always be the first step of a route.
$eref.title: The start of the route

___solarSystems.description: Should contain at least one entry.
___solarSystems.title: A list of possible solar systems

_88fromEntry.description: This will always be the first step of a route.
_88fromEntry.title: The start of the route

___solarSystems.description: Should contain at least one entry.
___solarSystems.title: A list of possible solar systems

___solarSystems.description: If provided, any solar system listed here will not be used as transit system.
___solarSystems.title: A list of solar systems to avoid

$eref.description: The type field determines how to interpret the parameter.
$eref.title: A generic travel rule

_88maxSecurityParam.description: Paths with the least amount of systems with equal or higher security are preferred.
_88maxSecurityParam.title: The maximum security rule avoids systems with equal or higher security

___limit.title: The first security value to avoid

_88transitCountParam.description: Paths with fewer transit systems are preferred.
_88transitCountParam.title: The transit count rule considers the amount of solar systems

_88rulePriority.description: 0 has the highest priority. Only if a rule determines two paths equal, the rule with the next lower priority will be considered.
_88rulePriority.title: The priority of the rule

_88minSecurityParam.description: Paths with the least amount of systems with lower security are preferred.
_88minSecurityParam.title: The minimum security rule avoids systems with lower security

___limit.title: The lowest acceptable security value a solar system should have

_88jumpDistanceParam.description: Paths with the least usage of jump drives are preferred.
_88jumpDistanceParam.title: The jump distance rule helps minimize jump fuel cost

$eref.description: Set one or several of the optional capabilities to indicate their availability.
$eref.title: Collection of travelling capabilities

_88jumpGateCapability.description: This capability allows the usage of jump gates between systems.
_88jumpGateCapability.title: Capability description for using jump gates

_88jumpDriveCapability.description: This capability allows the usage of jump drives between systems of New Eden.
_88jumpDriveCapability.title: Capability description for using jump drives

___distanceLimit.description: The upper limit in light years that can be travelled in one jump.

___via.description: The order of the waypoints will be optimized according to the rules.
___via.title: A list of waypoints that must be visited

___avoid.title: Things to avoid when finding a path

___to.description: If given, this destination will always be the last of the route.
___to.title: The fixed destination for the route
